chatbot.evidence: The customer mentioned that only the robot is active when trying to contact Vodacom customer care.
chatbot.description: The customer is complaining about the unavailability of human customer care agents and the reliance on the chatbot.
chatbot.suggestion: Improve the chatbot by adding more advanced features and capabilities to handle customer queries effectively.

complaint.description: The customer received a message from Vodacom stating that their alternate number for notifications has been deleted. However, they were unable to reach human customer care agents for further assistance.
complaint.suggestion: Ensure that human customer care agents are readily available to assist customers and improve the responsiveness of the customer care service.
